title: two things i want to report...
body:
1. there is a zed glitch where when you w q the second q doesnt cast or goes off

2. my friend has won 8 games in his placements but how come hes in bronze 5?

replies.body: I won 8 games lost 2= bronze 1 and I was in silver last season, however my friend won 6 games lost 4 = gold 5 when he was also in silver last season.
i saw a guy who got 0/10 and still made it into gold 4. riot jut hates us.

> [{quoted}](name=Talon12,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=LiLegMM3,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2016-01-21T04:08:30.411+0000)
>
> i saw a guy who got 0/10 and still made it into gold 4. riot jut hates us.

What rank was this guy last season. would understand that is he was plat 1 upwards last season...
in other words riot rolls a dice at the end of your provisionals and you just get whatever it lands on.

Riot please fix your game
i won 7 games of my promos and got b5
-_-

It's probably just about who you're matched against, like if you're fighting plats then you wouldn't be expected to win so your rank wouldnt change much.
But then you get rekt by a bunch of bronze 5's and...down the elo ladder you go
sigh 6-4 but b4... everyone is having the exact same issue wtf riot y u do dis
i won 4 and lost 4 so far but now im really worried... he was gold last season (i think elo boosted tho)
